text: @DrDenaGrayson @realDonaldTrump What? This is Fauci on February 2 discussing the risk of a "catastrophic" pandemic: https://t.co/SDp9OHM5xK

urls.title: Wuhan Coronavirus Looks Increasingly Like a Pandemic, Experts Say (Published 2020)
urls.description: Rapidly rising caseloads alarm researchers, who fear the virus may make its way across the globe. But scientists cannot yet predict how many deaths may result.
